<h1>Personal Blog</h1>

[![CodeQL Code Analysis](https://github.com/renjujv/renjujv.github.io/actions/workflows/codeql-analysis.yml/badge.svg?branch=dev)](https://github.com/renjujv/renjujv.github.io/actions/workflows/codeql-analysis.yml)

### Tech Used
GatsbyJS, ReactJS, Github Actions, Python, HTML5, CSS, JS

### Process
- Code is analysed for every commit using CodeQL Github Actions
- A new background is fetched every day at a specific time from Unsplash using a python script
- Gatsby website is built using Github Actions
- Built static website is deployed using Github Actions

---
Created with ❤️ using GatsbyJS
